static const gaia::base::String gaia::security::KeyChain::ACTION_STORAGE_CHANGED ( ) [static]

Broadcast Action: Indicates the trusted storage has changed.

Sent when one of this happens:

a new CA is added, an existing CA is removed or disabled, a disabled CA is enabled, trusted storage is reset (all user certs are cleared), when permission to access a private key is changed.
